actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that any person who pays any compensation to an illegal alien shall be subject to a criminal fine.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that any person who knowingly pays a salary or other compensation to an illegal alien for personal services actually rendered shall be subject to a criminal fine.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that any person who pays any compensation to an illegal alien shall be subject to a criminal fine.
